name: Spinny quest
description:
Help your friends to find the lost babies! 

Move left-right with keyboard arrows/ AD / joystick.

Jump with spacebar or "jump" button from joystick.

Like and share if you enjoyed and would like to see more levels, character and quests.

Platformer game created for Weekly Game Jam 153.

Art Design by "Greytan".

Game Development by "Miguel Sanchez".
